pages.title: Omnimeter
pages.text: The <item>Omnimeter/$ is an extremely important and useful tool. Right clicking with it on almost any Crossroads machine or block will provide a readout of important information, such as <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/heat)temperature/$, <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/rotary)speed, I value, energy/$, <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/fluid)fluid contents/$, and more.$(br2)It is expected
that the player has an <item>omnimeter/$ for Crossroads machines. WAILA is not a good substitute.$(br2)
Another basic tool that Crossroads uses a lot is the <item>$(l:essentials/wrench)wrench/$- though basically any mods' wrench will work.$(br2)
